The claim was made by Ashish Kohli: dograjournalist) on Twitter, who describes himself as a journalist reporting on border conflicts and terrorism in Jammu & Kashmir. He tweeted three photographs claiming they were taken recently in Kashmir.
A user commented on Kohli: s tweet suggesting that the photographs are old, which raised doubts about their authenticity.
Alt News: a fact-checking organization, conducted a reverse image search and found that one of the photographs had been tweeted by journalist Sameer Yasir in March 2019, several months before the government's move on Article 370.
Alt News also discovered that another ph: a J&K daily, in November 2016, indicating that it was not recent.
